verbose_text: However, in the early experimental studies, it has been postulated that reteplase seems to cause greater ADP - and thrombin induced platelet aggregation and greater glycoprotein IIb / IIIa (GPIIb / IIIa) expression 14, but there are conflicting results in the literature.
